casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Julio TORRES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 29, 174 A.3d 202 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or the decision on this petition.
